scripts.start-backend: cd backend && (.venv\Scripts\python.exe manage.py runserver || ./.venv/bin/python manage.py runserver)
scripts.lint-python: cd backend && (.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m black ../backend ../llm_orchestrator && .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m isort ../backend ../llm_orchestrator && .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m flake8 ../backend ../llm_orchestrator || ./.venv/bin/python -m black ../backend ../llm_orchestrator && ./.venv/bin/python -m isort ../backend ../llm_orchestrator && ./.venv/bin/python -m flake8 ../backend ../llm_orchestrator)
scripts.lint-python-check: cd backend && (.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m black --check ../backend ../llm_orchestrator && .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m isort --check ../backend ../llm_orchestrator && .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m flake8 ../backend ../llm_orchestrator || ./.venv/bin/python -m black --check ../backend ../llm_orchestrator && ./.venv/bin/python -m isort --check ../backend ../llm_orchestrator && ./.venv/bin/python -m flake8 ../backend ../llm_orchestrator)
